author: aco
msg: Fix for javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException when shutting down system services. refer to LBFUSE-283
- Added an unregisterSystemService to properly unregister SM system services.
- Remove unnecessary null checking in DeploymentService.java
- Called super.init in BaseSystemService.java to update the state of the bean

author: antelder
msg: Copy as-is the servicemix sca binding code to our repos. Its based on real old SCA code so don't even think about trying to compile it just yet

author: cam
msg: 1. Fixed problem with animating CSS properties where values would be
stringified using scientific notation instead of plain decimal.
2. o.a.b.anim package now does not depend on anything in o.a.b.dom.svg.

author: rdonkin
msg: Regenerated list of PMCers. Removed sections that are now covered in other documents.
